thread.title: Comfortable Quiet Stay
thread.title_full: Comfortable Quiet Stay - Review of Premier Inn London Bank (Tower) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AlanandSally
title: Comfortable Quiet Stay
text: Stayed here for one night midweek and can't fault the place. Friendly service, clean spacious room and a very comfortable night's sleep. The Hypnos beds have to be amongst the best in any hotel! Breakfast was good, again served by lovely staff. I would definitely stay here again when working in the City.
